poemContent: Green of the sea To greed of the grass The happy man smiled Until it wasn't, he smiled though sad Bleeding thro' red tears Papier du soleil Angst von die Zukunft Called the grass, as it bled Blood fell onto the sea Washing it yellow Emporious shell to speak wasn't but it was The tale of the sad old man be a tale of woe From happy to sad Where does he go? 
